lead_paragraph: President Petro O. Poroshenko said Monday at a high-level meeting with European Union officials that Ukraine would be able to meet the conditions to apply for membership.

headline.print_headline: Europe; Ukraine: Aiming for E.U. Membership

snippet: President Petro O. Poroshenko said Monday at a high-level meeting with European Union officials that Ukraine would be able to meet the conditions to apply for membership.
abstract: Ukrainian Pres Petro O Poroshenko assures European Union officials that his country will be able to meet EU membership conditions within five years.
